original_text: And he provided the first part for himself, because there, in a portion of the lawgiver, was he seated; and he came with the heads of the people, he executed the justice of the Lord, and his judgments with Israel.
korean_text: 그가 자기를 위하여 먼저 기업을 택하였으니 곧 입법자의 분깃으로 준비된 것이로다 그가 백성의 수령들과 함께 와서 여호와의 공의와 이스라엘과 세우신 법도를 행하도다

sentences.original_text: And he provided the first part for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신을 위해 첫 부분을 마련했고

sentences.original_text: because there, in a portion of the lawgiver, was he seated
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 율법 주시자의 분깃 중에 그가 앉았기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: and he came with the heads of the people
he executed the justice of the Lord
